<Technical_Specs>
<Spec>4K to 8K resolution; sufficient pixel density to render natural skin texture pores, hair strand definition, and foliage detail without noise or artifact prominence at normal viewing distance</Spec>

<Spec>Subtle organic motion blur on hair strands and fabric edges suggesting handheld camera and gentle subject movement during exposure; motion blur primarily directional toward wind-suggested motion direction, not omnidirectional</Spec>

<Composition>

<Focus>Selective focus on main subject's head, shoulders, and upper body; sharp enough to register emotional bearing despite downturned gaze. Crowd figures surrounding and behind subject rendered progressively out of focus with increasing distance. Background pedestrians soft-focus bokeh with directional motion blur indicating active movement. Focus depth sufficient to maintain subject clarity while emphasizing environmental blur.</Focus>
<Framing_Guide>Off-center composition with subject positioned slightly left or right of frame center, creating tension suggesting movement against crowd flow. Subject positioned in middle ground depth rather than frame foreground, emphasizing immersion within crowd rather than heroic prominence. Pedestrians distributed asymmetrically around subject; more crowd density on one side, creating visual counterweight to isolated figure. Natural, unbalanced framing suggesting spontaneous observation rather than deliberate compositional arrangement.</Framing_Guide>
</Composition>

</Region>

<Coordinates>x=35, y=30, w=30, h=50</Coordinates>
<Content>Primary subject: solitary pedestrian walking in opposite direction to surrounding crowd flow. Hair rendered with fine detail showing natural texture and color. Visible skin shows realistic tone and texture. Solitary presence emphasized by immediate surrounding blur and crowd figures moving perpendicular or parallel to subject's trajectory.</Content>
</Region>
<Region id="midground_transitional_figures">
<Coordinates>x=25, y=20, w=50, h=30</Coordinates>
<Content>Pedestrians in immediate vicinity of subject at middle-depth focus transition. Varying degrees of blur indicating depth layering; figures closest to subject's depth plane slightly sharper, others progressively softer. <Technical_Specs>
<Spec>4K to 6K resolution; sufficient detail for realistic human figure rendering and crowd texture without excessive sharpness amplifying documentary aesthetic</Spec>
<Spec>Moderate depth of field; f/2.8 to f/4.0 equivalent aperture providing selective focus on subject while allowing surrounding crowd to fall into progressive soft focus and motion blur</Spec>
<Spec>Significant motion blur applied to background pedestrians and crowd figures; blur direction and intensity varying based on directional flow and distance from camera. Subject figure motion blur minimized to preserve clarity and emotional expression.</Spec>
<Spec>Natural film grain and realistic digital noise simulating ISO 400-800 equivalent; grain structure organic and non-uniform, varying slightly with exposure and lighting zones. Grain visible particularly in shadow regions and muted color zones.</Spec>
<Spec>Chromatic aberration subtle and organic; minimal chromatic fringing except at extreme high-contrast edges (dark clothing silhouettes against bright sky). Rendering suggests real lens optics rather than digital artifact.</Spec>
<Spec>Lens vignetting moderate; frame edges slightly darkened creating gentle focus direction toward center where subject positioned. Vignetting effect consistent across frame without artificial radial falloff.</Spec>
<Spec>Neutral color temperature white balance; neither warm nor cool dominant. Gray tones rendered truthfully without color cast. Slight cool bias acceptable (5500-6000K) consistent with overcast daylight conditions without requiring artificial color correction.</Spec>
<Spec>Natural shallow depth of field bokeh; background crowd figures rendered with organic blur shapes corresponding to actual optical bokeh rather than radial blur overlay. Bokeh retains edge definition characteristic of real lenses.</Spec>
<Spec>Global illumination from diffuse overcast sky creating directional softness; no strong shadow definition or high-contrast lighting. Shadow edges soft and feathered, consistent with overcast conditions.</Spec>
<Spec>Material realism for human skin showing natural color variation, pore texture detail, and translucency in areas of light exposure. Fabric rendering shows weave texture and natural drape properties. Pavement shows worn surface character without excessive detail.</Spec>
<Spec>Post-processing restraint; avoid saturation enhancement, clarity boosting, or artificial sharpening. Maintain muted, emotionally restrained aesthetic consistent with documentary street photography. Accept natural focus imperfections and subtle focus softness.</Spec>
<Spec>No visible watermarks, logos, text, signatures, or digital identifiers anywhere in frame composition</Spec>
<Spec>Realistic crowd physics; pedestrian positions and spacing consistent with actual urban crowd behavior. No artificial perfect symmetry or aligned formations. Natural chaos and overlapping of figures.</Spec>
</Technical_Specs>
